description: Bowl, fragment of, greyish body covered with translucent greyish-green glaze. Floral medallion, similar to 36.9.4, incised in paste before glazing. Rough fragments of clay under foot. Yueh ware see card 36.9.1
markings: incised under glaze on base. Character Chi, which is one of the cyclical characters corresponding to the element Earth (T\'U)
title: Bowl Fragment
